item.description:
Hey Guys,
I'm headed to the Newport Irish Festival this labor day weekend and figured I'd throw it on the calender in case other folks are around and wanted to join in.

Check out the website at: http://www.newportfes...

Tickets are $15.00/day and can be purchased through the above site.

We've got folks coming from a number of different locations, and am some may be planning on heading to Waterfire in Providence as the festival concludes (see separate posting) so, in hopes of finding some sort of centralized meeting location, we'll be storing our cars for the day at the Attleboro Communter rail station off of 95 (easiest location for rapid 95 access) close to the border:
http://www.mapquest.c.... We'll take votes for evening plans and arrange carpooling from there.

We'll plan on meeting at the Communter Rail lot at 10:30 a.m. to get us to the Festival probably around 11:30-noon for a full day of Irish-ness :-). Will send my cell phone number to my yes's and maybe's this evening so we won't leave any tardies behind. It is $2.00 to park your car for the day in the commuter rail lot (which will be at least $8.00 cheaper than any lot in Newport and equals the Jamestown Bridge Toll, so might be quite the steal:-). Come prepared:-)

Email Lisa with any questions!
item.name: Newport Irish Festival: Aug 30
